## ErrorXActionLogout type

Action to log out the current user when an error occurs. Useful for authentication errors or session expiration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorXActionLogout = {
    action: 'logout';
    [key: string]: any;
};
```

## Example


```typescript
{
  action: 'logout',
  clearStorage: true,
  redirectURL: '/login'
}
```
